titles: An elogy upon the much lamented death of Mr Luke Fawne, junior, who dyed the sixth of January, 1650. being ten years, six moneths, and four days old.
author: Tutchin, Robert.
notes: Verse - "I'm big with Grief, That I can onely vent".
Signed at end: Robertus Tutchein [i.e. Robert Tutchin].
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Fawne, Luke, 1640-1651 --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
